attributes.action: Help Alan Johnson review his decision that Rochelle Wallis be deported under a crazy broadbrush application of the foreign brides legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mrs Wallis, a 19 year old Canadian lady is married to a British man, but is caught under a new set of legislation governing foriegn brides. See BBC website under 'Newsnight' for details

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
